tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    review_text STRING,
    review_date DATE,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE product_details (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL,
    description TEXT
);
